vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀμέριμν-ος, ον,
free from care, unconcerned, [Refs 5th c.BC+]adverb -νως Vett. Val.355.6, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: comparative -ότερον, ἔχειν[Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II passive, uncared for, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__III οἰνοχοεῖ κρήνης ἐξ ἀμεριμνοτέρης, either causing less care, i.e. more easily attained, of the fount of inspiration, or possibly less celebrated, [Refs]
__IV ἀμέριμνον, τό, ={ἀείζωον μέγα}, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: free from concern, free from care
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
free from concern, free from care
free from care, or solicitude, Mt. 28:14; 1Cor. 7:32*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: despreocupado, libre de preocupación o ansiedad ; les evitaremos dificultades (MAT.28:14)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 無慮無慮, 無需掛心的 (太 28:14; 林前 7:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 无虑无虑, 无需挂心的 (太 28:14; 林前 7:32)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không phải lo lắng; thoát khỏi sự lo lắng
